post.description: This endpoint allows clients to create a new Partner Proof of Concept (POC) by submitting the necessary details in the request body.

201.description: The POC has been successfully created.

put.summary: Get a Partner POC by ID

200.description: The POC has been successfully retrieved.

204.description: The POC has been successfully deleted.
